amendment.description: Amendments en bloc comprised of amendments numbered 58, 60, 61, 65, 67, 68, 69, 70, 71, 72, 75, 79, 80, 81 and 82 contained in House Report 114-112. See page D543 of the Congressional Record of May 14, 2015 for description of en bloc amendments.
amendment.purpose: An amendment comprised of amendments nos. 58, 60, 61, 65, 67, 68, 69, 70, 71, 72, 75, 79, 80, 81 and 82 printed in House Report 114-112 offered en bloc.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendments (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A018) offered by Mr. Thornberry.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendments en bloc (A018) offered by Mr. Thornberry.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendments (A018) Agreed to by voice vote.
